verses.roman:
madhye madhye āpane prabhu śloka paḍiyā
ślokera artha karena prabhu vilāpa kariyā

synonyms: madhye madhye—at intervals; āpane—personally; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śloka—a verse; paḍiyā—reciting; ślokera—of the verse; artha—meaning; karena—gives; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vilāpa kariyā—lamenting.
translation: At intervals, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu would also recite a verse. Then, in great lamentation, He would explain it.
